en-US.description:
The Heads or Tails game tests your ability to call it in the air.

To get started say "Alexa, open Heads or Tails".

The app will keep asking you to guess "heads or tails?" until you get it wrong.

Each right answer gives you a point.  High score gets bragging rights!
examplePhrases: Alexa, tell Heads or Tails to flip
Alexa, ask Heads or Tails for help
en-US.name: Heads or Tails
en-US.summary: The Heads or Tails game tests your ability to call it in the air.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: No special instructions.  Just say "Alexa, open Heads or Tails" and play the game.
